title: WTB: Red tape cards that recently went through eBay (GM)
author: Redleg25

posts.post_title: WTB: Red tape cards that recently went through eBay (GM)
posts.post_content: Looking to buy T206 cards that recently went through ebay via Greg Morris. They were part of a scrapbook collection that was sold as a group on HA initially. Almost all have red tape on the backs which held them in place at one time. Most also have paper loss on backs from removal. Most are also Sweet Cap. Interested in commons and stars. Singles and groups. If one is in your collection I may be able to trade you the same card w/o tape. Have done that several times already. Please message what you have. I also have a post in the FB groups. Thanks
I don't have any of these, but, being relatively new to the hobby, what is the allure of the red taped backs (or if that is proprietary feel free to ignore :) )?
Not dying to give this up, but open to it:
Handful went up for auction on ebay.
